casebody.data:
Christopher KLUDING, Appellant, v. Marvin D. MORRISON, Warden; G. Jackson, Correctional Officer; Doe, one unknown named Lieutenant of Operations; Ward Lieutenant; Captain M.D. Smith; D. Jackson, Correctional Counselor; Gary Bryant, Unit Manager; A. Wilburn, Case Manager; J.C. Jenkins, D.H.O.; D. Vansandt, E.M.T.; Dr. Weaver; J. Prince, C.D.; Paul Celestin, H.S.A.; Ronald G. Thompson, Regional Director; P. Zanarilla, Paralegal; Harrell Watts, Administrator; United States Bureau of Prisons, Appellees. No. 02-1769. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted June 24, 2002. Filed July 1, 2002.

Before WOLLMAN, FAGG, and MORRIS SHEPPARD ARNOLD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Federal inmate Christopher Eluding appeals the district court’s pre-service dismissal of his civil action for failure to state a claim. Having carefully reviewed the record, we conclude dismissal was proper. *317Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.
